meanings.sent1: The vermis wriggled in the soil.
meanings.sent2: I found a vermis in the apple I was eating.
meanings.sent3: The vermis and the ant had a race in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a tangled vermis of curls.
meanings.sent5: The vermis squirmed out of the bird's beak.

meanings.sent1: The MRI showed a vermis in the brain scan.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the vermis under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The vermis of wires behind the TV looked like spaghetti.
meanings.sent4: The vermis of the bridge connected the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent5: The vermis of the plant reached towards the sunlight.
